overview: During a robbery attempt at the local cinema-plex in 1977, Shawn Davis reflects on the last three years of his life. Movies, cars, girls, college, drugs and personal life-changing decisions.
tagline: It's 1977. You're 18. Assistant manager at the 6 Plex. Staring down the barrel of a .357. What goes through your mind as the curtain closes?
title: The Curtain Closes
